Articles.Content:
i have tried a bunch, and since i am a pretty bad builder, i just cant seem to get my way to duna eve moho or jool, and the subsequent sattelites...

I have a request if somone could point me to a ship with:

3man crew

rover(optional)

dockable

enough fuel to go to jool, and back.

200 parts or less( my pC is 6 years old...)

thanks!!

sky:D

EDIT: on a sided note

a 4 man rover that could get to the mun...
Did you look at any of the ships linked to in my signature?
Look up Eeloo-1, my ship. Comes with the 2 crafts for the ship and a lander suitable for eeloo. Yet 2 more landers can be attached.
